commit.message:
Expect:100-Continue header handling

Signed-off-by: Maxim Nesen <maxim.nesen@oracle.com>

nodes.bodyText: Could you please use the builder pattern?
Allows for HTTP Expect:100-Continue being handled by the HttpUrlConnector
